name: Strawberry Vanilla Pudding
author: Shirley Drury

ingredients.name: to 5 c. angel food cake cubes
pkg. instant vanilla or lemon pudding

instructions: Put cake in 9 x 9 inch pan. Mix pudding, softened ice cream and milk until well blended. Pour over cake cubes and set. Dissolve Jell-O with water and put in frozen strawberries. Stir until it starts to jell. Pour over cake and pudding and put in refrigerator.
